title: Credit Application Request
body:
Dear {{companyName}},

We are writing to request that you complete a credit application to continue our business proceedings. This will help us to provide you with the best service options available.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
[Your Company Name]

title: Credit Application Follow-Up
body:
Dear {{companyName}},

We recently sent you a credit application and would like to remind you to complete it at your earliest convenience. Completing the application is necessary for us to proceed with our services.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Warm regards,
[Your Company Name]
